name: cfreturn
description:
Returns result values from a component method. Contains an
 expression returned as result of the function.
 An expression; the result of the function from which this tag
 is called.

examples.title: Tag Syntax: Increment a number by 10
examples.description: Function takes a number as an argument and return after incrementing it by 10
examples.code:
<cffunction name="IncrementByTen">
<cfargument name="num" required="true">

<cfset incrementedValue = arguments.num + 10 />

<cfreturn incrementedValue >
</cffunction>

<cfoutput>#incrementByTen(30)#</cfoutput>

examples.title: Script syntax: Increment a number by 10
examples.description: Function takes a number as argument and returns after incrementing it by 10
